Package com.stormpath.sdk.group

Interface Summary
CreateGroupRequest Represents an attempt to create a new Group record in Stormpath.
CreateGroupRequestBuilder A Builder to construct CreateGroupRequests.
Group A group is a uniquely-named collection of Accounts within a Directory.
GroupCriteria An Group-specific Criteria class, enabling a Group-specific fluentquery DSL.
GroupList A CollectionResource containing Group instances.
GroupMembership A GroupMembership represents the association of an Account and a Group.
GroupMembershipList A CollectionResource containing GroupMembership instances.
GroupOptions<T> Group-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Group resources.
 

Class Summary
Groups Static utility/helper methods for working with Group resources.
 

Enum Summary
GroupStatus
